profileSection.title: Profile
profileSection.name: Tanvir Ibn Touhid
profileSection.description: I have strong fundamentals, practical web development experience, and sharp problem-solving skills. Seeking a long-term remote role to contribute across frontend and backend in a collaborative team.

descriptionList: Built internal tools using Nuxt.js on the frontend and Express.js on the backend within a microservice architecture.
Integrated REST APIs and handled complex UI logic using Vue and JavaScript.
Customized and developed add-ons in Odoo using Python and JavaScript.
Refactored legacy codebases (EJS, Express.js, MySQL, jQuery) to improve maintainability by applying DRY and SOLID principles.
Collaborated with cross-functional remote teams to meet delivery deadlines.
Developed a full-featured HRM system using TypeScript, React, Express.js, Prisma, and Tailwind CSS.
Built and managed deployment automation pipelines using GitHub CI/CD, Docker, and Nginx.
Configured load balancing (Round Robin), proxy pass, and SSL with Nginx.
Achieved 100% cost savings by replacing a $25/month invoice system with a custom in-house solution.
Led frontend development for property management software and independently managed full development life cycles.
Worked on a photo editing platform with frame presets, admin approval flow, and integrated payment system.
Delivered precise UX-conformant interfaces using Vue.js based on client specifications.
Gained hands-on experience working under senior mentorship and collaborating on frontend infrastructure and best practices.

items.description: Modern libraries, UI frameworks, and state management tools used to build responsive, maintainable web and mobile interfaces.
Technologies used for server-side development, API creation, and database management with both relational and NoSQL systems.
Tools and practices for deployment automation, web servers, operating systems, and architectural design. Includes experience with ML experimentation.
Tools for version control, collaborative development, and automated deployment pipelines using Git and GitHub Actions.
